text: That was my intention. So KmerAnalysis has usable stuff in it, including counting and projection etc. but because it was used as a base for the assembly package as well, I didn't bother doing releases as it moved fast enough that tagging would have been annoying.

text: Okay cool. Do you mind if I make a PR to add minhashing? I suspect you already have a kmer composition in KmerAnalysis.jl, as part of the "counting" interface/functionality, right?
